title: Trends in Colloid and Interface Science XXIV

Trends in Colloid and Interface Science XXIV
Springer; 1st Edition | May 25, 2011 | ISBN-10: 3642190375 | 208 pages | PDF | 10.52 MB

This volume includes 35 contributions to the 24th Conference of the European Colloid and Interface Society which took place in September 2010 in Prague.
